choices: Raven Skye
Joey Phillips
Both
1.content: To start things off, select which character you would like to focus on.
1.title: Select Your Character

choices: Fountain of Youth
Shipwreck of Zeno
Golden Statue of Beasts
Temple of Transformation
Something else
11.content:
It was extremely quiet on a cold foggy morning when Raven Skye, a renowned treasure hunter, received a tip on the location of an ancient artifact that peaked her interest. Shortly afterward she had already began the preparations for her journey. Once her equipment had been chosen and her preparations had been complete she set off on her latest expedition.

But what was she in search for?
11.title: Rayne's Quest

choices: Raven collected some samples from the fountain.
Raven slipped into the fountain.
Raven discovered that she had been followed.
111.content:
Several days had passed since Raven set off on her latest expedition. From a plane flying above the deep jungles of South America, Raven parachuted into the heart of the jungle. She landed safely in the jungle. After regaining her composure she removed her helmet and slipped a phone from her backpack.

"Joey," Raven said on the phone, "I've made it. I've landed safely at the drop-off point."

A masculine voice was heard on the other end of the phone line. "That's great, Raven, that's great. Now listen, you shouldn't be far from the your target. Head to the East until you find some old temple ruins. Oh, and be careful, it is said that the fountain of youth is protected by an ancient tribe."

"Thanks Joey, don't worry about me, I'll be fine. Raven out." With that said, Raven disconnected her phone and placed it back in her bag.

Her journey had begun. She trekked through the heart of the jungle, seemingly for hours, until she reached the remnants of an old ancient temple, just as Joey explained. Fortunately for Raven however, there was not a tribesman to be found. Believing that she was in the clear, she swiftly approached the temple grounds. Upon the entrance Raven found a tablet with a Mayan emblem upon it. She shoved the tablet into her backpack and entered the temple ruins. It was dark within the interior of the temple. Realizing this, Raven put on her night vision goggles and continued investigating the ruins.

Within the temple there was absolute silence. Every movement that Raven made was echoed throughout the temple ruins. All that could be found was stone, dust and bones. Soon however she discovered a hidden trap door in a destroyed room in the far corner of the temple. She leaped through the trap door and continued her search until she reached a stone door which required some sort of tablet to open. Raven reached into her backpack and took out the tablet that she picked up earlier. She fitted it into the door and watched in amazement as the door opened itself. She stepped into the newly discovered room, which lit up from a crack in the wall.

There it was. A truly remarkable sight to behold. With her eyes glued to her discovery, she reached for her phone once more. "Joey," she said over the phone, "I found it. I've found the legendary Fountain of Youth!"

Joey laughed over the phone as Raven slowly approached the fountain. "I can't believe it! This must be what Ponce De Leon found! I guess through false translations it was thought to be in Florida, and yet there you are, just a few feet away from it! This could be the find of the century!"

"Imagine the wonders that we could achieve with this," Raven giggled excitedly as she gazed into the clear, flowing water of the fountain.

"I know," Joey continued, "Just be careful with what you're doing. We have no idea of the capabilities of this fountain."

"Thanks Joey. I wouldn't mind getting rid of a few wrinkles myself if I'm honest," Raven laughs jokingly, "Raven out." Raven placed her phone back into her backpack and bent down to gain a closer look at the clear, sparkling water. She was mesmerized, as if she was staring into something that she expected in some sort of dream. The fountain itself must not have been touched for centuries, and yet it looks as if it was brand new. At that moment, Raven noticed something in the corner of her eye.

It was another stone tablet, once again with a Mayan inscription. She translated the inscription for herself, which read "Water from the fountain of youth can restore one's youth, but thee be warned, it also carries a curse to those who would take it from these grounds."

"Curious," Raven thought to herself as she places the tablet aside.

What happened next?
111.title: The Fountain of Youth

choices: The curse came to fruition.
Raven was captured.
Raven successfully brought the samples to the plane.
1111.content:
After dropping to her knee, within an arm's reach of the crystal water, Raven took out several containers from her backpack. She then returned to her phone.

"Joey, I'm going to bring a few samples back to the plane," Raven said over the phone, "We need to analyze this substance or else how can we be sure that this is the legendary Fountain of the Youth?"

Joey replied to Raven's call. "As much as I would love to agree with you, I've just been looking through a few notes on the fountain. Has there been any warning about taking some of the water?"

"Well," Raven admitted, "I just found this Mayan inscription warning that a curse would be brought upon..."

Suddenly Joey interrupted Raven. "If that's the case, it would be for the best to just leave it. I can't have you risking your life for this."

"Relax Joey, nothing's going to happen."

"Still, I'd rather not..."

"Joey, listen, there is no such thing as a curse. I'm bringing back a few samples and that's the end of it. I'll meet you back at the plane. Raven out." With that said, Raven slipped the phone back into her backpack.

Carefully she lowered one of the containers into the clear water and filled it up. She continued this routine until she filled six containers of the water, fortunately without getting a drop on herself.

With a backpack of containers full of water from the fountain, she found her way out of the temple.

After leaving the temple however, what happened next?
1111.title: Sampling the Fountain

choices: She would become older.
She would become younger.
11111.content:
The sunlight broke through the trees in the jungle. As Raven felt the sun glimmer over her body she felt a slight tingling all over.

Shrugging it off, Raven continued on her trek through the jungle.

She may not have realized it at this point, but she had in fact been cursed. But what was the curse?
11111.title: Choice of Curses

choices: She would regress quickly.
She would randomly regress later.
111112.content: What was the curse of the Fountain of Youth?
111112.title: Curse of Youth

choices: During a speech in an elementary school.
During an expedition in Vietnam.
1111122.content:
Raven thought nothing of the tingling sensation in her body as she met with Joey Phillips on the plane. "See Joey," she laughed, "I told you nothing would happen to me. We're going to make a fortune from this!" And with that said, the plane took off, sending the duo on a long trip back home.

Several weeks had passed since Raven returned from her latest expedition. Joey was left to deal with the containers of water from the fountain as Raven took a well deserved rest. However throughout those weeks, the tingling sensation in her body persisted and seemingly began to grow more and more irritating for the adventurer, and yet she would continue to think little of it.

Little did she realize it, but the curse that was put upon her would soon come to fruition. When she would least expect it, she would instantly lose twenty years from her age, she would instantly become a child no older than the age of six, and who's to tell if it would stop there? What if she doesn't stop regressing?

But when did the curse come to fruition?
1111122.title: Random Regression

choices: Raven tried to blend in with the students.
An old enemy invaded the school.
11111221.content:
Back in her hometown of Ruby City, Raven Skye was offered an invitation to stop by at the local elementary school to give an inspirational speech to the students. Unwilling to refuse such an offer to return to the school where she grew up, she accepted the offer.

She arrived upon the school grounds, wearing a white tank-top and denim shorts. With her motorcycle parked outside, she entered the school, where she was greeted by her old fourth grade teacher, Mrs. Tabitha Burns, who had apparently dropped to teaching first grade. It gave Raven a sense of nostalgia to return to her old stomping grounds and reunite with her favorite teacher, who appeared to have aged well since Raven graduated to middle school.

Throughout the morning Raven told the students of Tabitha's first grade class her terrifying and exciting adventures throughout her career as the children listened anxiously. Each story that she told was better than the last, and just before the lunch break, Raven went into the details of her latest expedition, which took her one of the greatest discoveries in the world, the legendary Fountain of Youth.

She told the class of the chilling curse that was supposed to have been brought upon her. "A terrible curse," she explained, "To those who would dare take the water from the fountain. From what I've learned from my partner, it is said that whoever takes the water from the fountain will instantly lose twenty years of their age."

After the speech was over, several students raised their hands, all wanting to ask the young adventurer a question. Raven picked out a young black-haired boy with his hand held high. "If you was cursed, how old would you be now?" He asked curiously, making Raven slightly blush and chuckle. "That's a personal question," she stated, "But if you want to know, if the curse was real, I'd be about six years old by now! I'd be starting first grade again!" The children were astonished by this, and began to talk amongst themselves.

"Miss," a young blonde-haired girl asked, "What if the curse hasn't happened yet? What if it was yet to happen?" This made Raven slightly worried, and made her think about her answer. "Don't worry sweetie," she replied, "Nothing is going to happen to me." And with that said, the school bell rang, alerting the students that their lunch break had begun. With Tabitha's permission, they all rushed out of the classroom, leaving behind a room of empty chairs and desks. Now all alone, Raven Skye was free to address her old teacher.

The two talked more about Raven's adventures, until Tabitha asked her a question. "Raven, aren't you worried about this curse of yours?" Puzzled by this, Raven answers back. "What do you mean?"

"I mean," Tabitha continued, "It's not too late. You could wake up one morning to find that you were twenty years younger! What would you do then?"

"Don't worry Mrs. Burns," Raven laughed boldly, "I'll be fine." Suddenly however, just five minutes later, the tingling sensation that Raven had suffered since her expedition grew rapidly until the room was flooded by a blinding bright light. Blinded by the shining light, Raven felt her entire body begin to change. She felt as if she was shrinking and her body was bloating. Her breasts shrank as her hair reshaped from a ponytail into braids.

After several seconds the light faded away. Raven regained her sight, only to be terrified by the result. She looked down in horror to see that her entire body had transformed. The tall, fit and attractive brunette was now a short, fat and stubby little girl. Her denim shorts had slipped down to her ankles and she wore her tank-top as if it was a dress. It was as if she was reliving a memory of her childhood, when she was a chubby little girl who was always picked on by her peers.

Still in shock of her transformation, she then looked up, following the suddenly massive length of Tabitha's legs. She continued to tilt her head back until finally she looked up to her old teacher's face. A shiver ran up Raven's spine at the mere size of Tabitha, as if Tabitha had somehow become the size of a goddess!

Tabitha was in shock. Quickly she leaped out of her chair and descended to her knee. The size of her face was tremendous in comparison to Raven's face. "Raven!?" Tabitha panicked, "Raven, is that you?"

At that moment Raven began to panic. "What just happened!? What just happened to me!?" She was clearly in dismay.

"Raven," Tabitha whimpered, "I hate to say it, but you was wrong. That curse was all too true. You look like a young child!"

"What!?" Raven screamed, "No! It can't be! What am I going to do!?"

What happened next?
11111221.title: Back to School

choices: Skip to lunch break.
Skip somewhere else.
111112211.content:
"It's okay," Tabitha said in an attempt to calm the chubby six-year old girl down, "Don't panic. I have an idea." Raven wiped a tear from her eye, trying her best not to fall into causing a tantrum, and anticipated her old teacher's idea. She watched as Tabitha reached into her desk and pulled out a small school uniform. "I'm sorry Raven," Tabitha continued, handing the tiny outfit to you, "But you'll just have to try your best to blend in for now."

Holding the uniform in her flabby arms, Raven gulped, shuddering at the thought of revisiting her nightmarish childhood, but from her new point of view, it would be the best not to get onto the bad side of her teacher, who now stood intimidatingly over her. And so with little other option, Raven ripped herself out of her old clothes, while Tabitha looked away, granting Raven some privacy.

As Tabitha looked out of the window, Raven reluctantly tried to put her new uniform on, but struggled in doing so because of her new, chubby posterior. She was unable to squeeze into the white, tight shirt, and could not breathe in hard enough to slide the black skirt above her thick thighs. She stood feeble in the nude, failing miserably at putting on the uniform. So as her entire face blushed red, she tugged on the long skirt of her old teacher, her turned to face her with a clear expression of pity. She knew what poor little Raven asked for, so without hesitation, Tabitha quickly helped her to put her new uniform on. Tabitha tugged ferociously, squeezing Raven's chunky frame into her new shirt, pulled up the tight skirt and helped her slip her feet into her small shoes. After several minutes, there Raven stood, reliving her harsh memories as a fat little girl in school uniform, dreading what she was about to face in her first day back in elementary school.

As the second school bell rung, Raven suddenly hid behind the tall frame of her old teacher, who allowed her students to enter the classroom and take their respectful seats. Tabitha then addressed the students.

"Children," Tabitha explained to the class, "I must inform you all that there is a new student in your class. We don't know how long she's going to stay here, but hopefully it won't be for long. Please give a warm welcome to..."

Before Tabitha could give the name of the temporary student, she immediately realized that revealing Raven's real name would blow her attempt to blend in with the students.

At the last minute, she thought of her own daughter and continued. "Please welcome Catherine Skye!" With that said, Tabitha steps away from her desk, revealing the chubby six-year old to the classroom.

Raven, who was unhappy with her new name choice, stood pathetically and nervously in front of the class, who gazed at her in a variety of expressions. Raven stared back at all the students, who suddenly looked tremendously larger than her previous encounter with them.

"Now Catherine," Tabitha said to the six-year old, "Please take a seat." Obeying her teacher's command, Raven, now going by the name Catherine, approached her new desk, which sat in the very front and middle of the classroom, where she could not avoid the glancing eyes of her new peers. She squeezed into her desk and let out a huge sigh of disbelief. Never in a million years would she ever find herself sitting at a desk at elementary school again!

The class seemed to drag on forever. It felt like Catherine was in her equivalent of hell, revisiting her nightmarish past all over again. However, as Catherine would soon find out, this would only be the beginning of an adventure like she had never embarked on in her life.
111112211.title: Blending In

choices: Skip to Catherine's arrival at Tabitha's home.
Skip to Catherine's first day at Jade River.
1111122112.content:
The day was pure agony for the chunky little girl, who had to endure the harsh abuse from her new peers as she did in her childhood. It was an unwelcome day for poor Catherine Skye, who struggled to breathe in her new tight uniform throughout the entire day. It was a relief for her to hear the final bell, signaling the end of the school day, but as all the students fled the school grounds, Catherine was left with a new problem.

As the corridors emptied, Catherine, who had still not come to terms with her transformation, stumbled to Tabitha's classroom, where she found her old teacher preparing to leave. Tabitha looked at her with sympathy. She knew that Catherine had gone through a rough day, and so taking pity on the chubby six-year old girl, Tabitha offered her to stay with her for the night, just as long as she shared a bed with her fifteen-year old daughter.

Catherine had no other option. While her partner, Joey Phillips, was out at an excavation in Egypt, she was left alone to suffer the consequences of stealing from the legendary Fountain of Youth. After brief consideration, Catherine nodded her head pathetically and embraced her old teacher, squeezing tightly to her long, thick calves. Tabitha then lowered herself to Catherine's level to embrace her herself, despite Catherine's fear of her huge, long arms wrapped around her chunky frame.

"Wait a minute," Tabitha suddenly said, releasing her hold from the little girl, "I forgot to mention."

"Mention what?" Catherine asked curiously.

"You might be stuck like this for a while," Tabitha continued, "And if we can't make any better arrangements, I'm afraid that you'd have to join some of us on our camping trip over the weekend."

"What camping trip?" Catherine yelped in slight fright.

"We've arranged for some of our students to stay at the Jade River Campsite from Friday to Monday," Catherine's old teacher explained, without any consideration of Catherine's horrified expression, "And since I'll be supervising, and if we can't find anywhere for you to stay by Friday, then I'm afraid that you'll have to join us. I hope that'll be okay."

Catherine's expression could easily be read. She was horrified by the mere thought of camping with the same classmates that mocked her harshly throughout the day. And if that wasn't bad enough, she feared the worst about returning to Jade River, where she lived one of the most dramatic points of her cruel childhood. But with so little choice, she had to accept and face her greatest fears to relive her nightmarish past and return to where those nightmares turned for the worst.

Reluctantly Catherine agreed that she would join her old teacher and return to the Jade River Campsite. And shortly after her agreement, Catherine immediately made a statement. "Can we just get out of this place now please?" With that said, Tabitha grabbed Catherine by the hand and took her to her new, temporary home.

As the reader, where would you like to go from here?
1111122112.title: After School

choices: Skip to bed time.
Skip to bath time.
11111221121.content:
It was a long journey, and Raven, who was now under the alias of Catherine, found herself sweating like a pig at the end of it, but at last she arrived at her new residence. She watched, awestruck by the size of the cozy-looking house, as Tabitha unlocked the front door and swung it open.

Immediately, as the door swung open, a huge Great Dane stormed out of the house and charged towards the new arrival. Raven may have had a history of battling ferocious beasts in her career, but the astonished size of the dog, who stood tall and proudly over the chubby girl, was more than enough for her to let out a fearful yelp. She simply froze in horror as the huge dog skulked around her, sniffing and searching her person. Realizing Raven's uncomfortable stance was a cry of fear, Tabitha pulled on the collar of the dog, yelling at it while doing so, and pulled it back into the house, where it rushed presumably into the kitchen.

Still shaking from this experience, Raven unwillingly followed the much older Tabitha into the home. The rays of the sun that seemingly beamed down upon her was overcome by the cool breeze produced by air conditioning. As Tabitha closed the door behind her, Raven, for the first time since her transformation, felt a sense of comfort upon her soft, chunky body. She was treated with an average-looking house, suitable for a family of four or more, with white walls and patterned carpets. For the first time in possibly years, Raven truly felt like she was home. The only fact that dampened her warm spirit was the age that she stood at during that moment.

"Catherine!" The sudden screech from Tabitha caught the chubby little girl off guard. "Come down here for a minute, won't you?"

Suddenly the six-year old could hear footsteps booming from above. Gazing up to the top of the staircase, her sense of comfort was destroyed as she saw a young, tall and attractive teenager storm down the steps with an aggravated expression upon her face. As the teenager loomed over the little girl like a giant, the teenager glanced at the chubby girl, seemingly agitated by her presence. "Hi Mom," she suddenly said, "Who's this?"

As Raven gulped in fright, too afraid to wipe the sweat from her brows, Tabitha introduced her. "Catherine, my sweet, this is Raven. She is going to stay with us for a little while. Would you mind if she shared a bed with you?" In her mind, Raven started to panic. All she wanted was to have someone to look after her until she found a way to return to her rightful age, let alone another place to stay. The last thing that she wanted was to have the nerve to ask an aggravated teenager if she could share a bed with her! She knew that she would end up agreeing to stay with her old teacher, and the look upon the teenager's face following this question clearly showed that this was evident.

"What!?" Catherine blurted, clearly ticked off by such an offer, "Why would I share my bed with a thing like her!? I'm not sharing a bed with some pig in a dress!" The teenager's words were hurtful, but there was nothing that Raven could do but stay quiet. As much as Raven wanted to take matters into her own hands, and teach Catherine a lesson that she won't ever forget, she knew that this was wishful thinking.

"Catherine!" Tabitha suddenly snapped at her fifteen-year old daughter. "Don't speak to our guest like that! If you don't treat her like your little sister, I will ground you for a month!" With that said, Catherine stormed back upstairs and into her bedroom in a tantrum. From what she's now seen from Tabitha's daughter, Raven knew that she was in for an awkward night, or at least more of an awkward night.

In an attempt to comfort her, Tabitha bent to her knees, dropping herself down to Raven's level, and spoke to her. "Don't worry about Catherine," she explained, "She does get a bit moody at times. I think that she's been having boyfriend problems lately, but don't worry, you'll soon get used to it."

"Thanks," Raven blankly said, clearly unhappy with her current situation, but as much as she pouted, the more she looked like a grumpy, pathetic fat little girl.

"Come on Raven," Tabitha said once again, "Since you're only six years old now, that means that you'll have to go to bed early. So why not make something out of what little time you have for the rest of the night, and we can sort out this mess in the morning!" Unfortunately Raven was not as enthusiastic about these plans as her old teacher was.

As the reader, where would you like to go from here?
11111221121.title: Welcome to the Burns Family

choices: Some of her fellow students prepared a prank for her.
Sofia Valda, Raven's arch nemesis, arrived at the scene.
11111221122.content:
The days went by slowly for poor Raven, who was forced to live with the name Catherine, but this was the least of her concerns. Her fellow students stopped at nothing to humiliate her. All the girls disliked her and all the boys poked fun at her, and all because of her humongous, shapely frame. She was forced to relive her nightmarish childhood once again, but all along she knew that the worst was yet to come.

The weekend finally arrived, and after a grueling long bus journey, Raven finally arrived at the Jade River Campsite. From the moment she stepped off the bus and gazed at the old wooden shelters, her horrific memories quickly emerged in her mind. Raven had faced many fearful obstacles in her career as an explorer, but they were nothing compared to what she was about to face.

Wearing a tight girl scout uniform, which would look cuter on any other skinnier girl of her age, Raven stumbled amongst the crowd of elementary school students towards their destination. The pushing and shoving of the crowd forced her into the campsite. As the crowd stopped, they were silenced by the presence of their superior, Tabitha Burns, who was in charge of the entire trip.

"Hello students," she announced proudly, "Welcome to Jade River! After I give you the grant tour, feel free to explore the environment. Who knows what you could find out in these woods!"

The tour of the campsite had become a routine in Raven's mind because she had lived it before, and this experience was no different to her previous experience. It was like she was mirroring her past actions, leading up to one of the most dramatic points of her cruel childhood.

The tour ended quickly, and everyone was freed from her attention. After a brief comfort chat to Tabitha, in an attempt to calm her nerves, Raven unwillingly traveled through the woods. At least trekking through the woods brought back some memories as an explorer, where she would trek through dark forests in search of lost and ancient artifacts, but unfortunately it seemed like those days were over, since the mysterious disappearance of her former partners. It was also noticeably much more difficult to trek through the woods, as she found it much more challenging and exhausting.

As sweat immediately broke from her forehead, and as fatigue quickly set in, Raven soon arrived besides the river. She sat besides the river and watched the flowing water, pondering on her current situation.

Little did she realize was that she was in fact being watched by sinister eyes. She may not have known it, but soon Raven was going to have an encounter that she wouldn't soon forget.

But what happened next?
11111221122.title: Welcome to Jade River

choices: They pushed Raven into the river.
They lured Raven back to the campsite.
111112211221.content:
A small group of female elementary school students, ranged between first and fifth grade, contemplated within the woods, preparing a sinister prank to pull on the poor little fat girl, who sat quietly besides the river.

But what was the prank?
111112211221.title: Mean Girls

choices: Yes, she was able to escape.
No, she was caught by her enemy.
111112212.content:
"It's okay," Tabitha said in an attempt to calm the chubby 6-year old girl down, "I'll go and get help. You just stay in this class and wait until I get back. Is that okay?" Raven wiped a tear from her eye and nodded her head, trying her best to avoid balling with tears. Raven watched on with a hint of concern upon her face as Tabitha ascended back to her feet. Raven was intimidated by the mere height of her old teacher. Tabitha rushed out of the classroom and closed the door behind her. Raven quietly stood still, too afraid to do anything, until she heard some sort of van pull up outside of the school.

Shortly afterward Raven's heart stopped when she heard a loud gunshot from outside. She quickly rushed toward the window and tried looking outside, only to fail by her short stature. She even tried standing on her toes, but her heavy frame prevented her from keeping her balance. Raven became frustrated until she heard people screaming outside of the classroom. So after struggling to open the door, she crept outside to take a peek, only to be overwhelmed by the children and teachers screaming and retreating down the halls.

Raven crept further down the hallway until she saw five figures entering the building. There were four men, in black outfits, each wearing a ski mask and carrying an AK-47, while they were led by a woman in a tight black jumpsuit with long, blonde hair and carrying a silenced M9 handgun in each hand. Raven recognized the woman, leading the men into the building, from her past.

The woman's name was Sofia Valda, better known as 'Solitaire'. She was a mercenary who used to work for an organization called 'Fem-Zo', a company that focused entirely on genetic engineering and the alteration of the human female. However after years of service, Sofia was released from her contract with the company after failing to kill Raven Skye during one of her expeditions. Seeing her arch nemesis march down the hallway, with the expression upon her face, made Raven fearful for her life.

Sofia then addressed her men. Raven was able to hear what she wanted. "Alright boys," Sofia calmly told her minions, "Raven Skye is the only woman who knows how to get to the Fountain of Youth. She is around here somewhere. I want you to find her and bring her to me."

Realizing that Sofia was not one to mess around with, and without any form of communication with any of her allies at this point, Raven immediately rushed out of sight, fearing for her life. She ran as fast as she could with her short and overweight frame, finding it difficult to breathe and harder for her to move. She could not recall another time when she was so tired after so little movement, remembering how much hard work it took for her to lose all the weight and become as slim and fit as she was in her twenties.

As Raven tried her best to hide from her enemies, she began to hear the men in black calling her name, calling for her as if she was a pet. Raven knew that she could not allow her rival to find her this way, so no matter how much it hurt her, she knew that she had to keep moving.

Raven Skye was very slow in her movement. Her enemies drew ever closer to finding her, killing everyone who tried to stop them. It seemed as if the more Raven ran, the closer she got to getting caught. Her only option was to hide from the attackers. She managed to squeeze into one of the student's lockers further down the hall. She held her heavy breath and watched silently as the attackers marched past her until they turned around the corner. Thinking that she was in the clear, Raven popped out of the locker.

But was she in the clear?
111112212.title: School Invaders

choices: No, she was unable to escape.
Yes, she managed to escape.
1111122122.content:
After popping out of the tight locker, Raven took a moment to catch her breath, only to find that she was not in the clear. Before she could make a move, someone grabbed her by the shoulder with a tight grip. Raven froze in horror. She looked up to her captor, who looked down at her with a wicked smile on her face. She was caught by her old enemy. She was caught by Sofia Valda.

Raven did not resist capture, realizing if it would be a feeble attempt with her new stature. She was extremely intimidated by the huge size of her arch nemesis, who laughed to herself upon seeing her face.

"Raven?" Sofia asked in delight, "Raven Skye? Is that really you?" She burst out with laughter as her nails dug into Raven's shoulder. "Had a little too much water from the fountain did we?"

Feeling humiliated, Raven looked down to the ground in shame. "Shut up," she grumbled.

"Come on Raven," Sofia sarcastically chuckled, "I mean, look at you! You look like a little porker!"

Raven began to sulk. "Shut up," she moaned once again.

"Is that what they used to call you? Porker? Is that right, porker? Pork chops?" Sofia bursts out with laughter once more, making Raven remember the horrors that she had growing up. "This is great. This is too good! You look so pathetic like that! Don't you, porker? A baby porker, aren't you?"

"Leave me alone," Raven grumbled under her breath.

"Come on porky," Sofia continued, "Don't sulk like a baby! It's not my fault that you've been packing on the pounds! It's not my fault that you were cursed by the Fountain of Youth. It's not my fault that you have to live like that again! Like a little porker! Huh? Right porky?"

Raven didn't say a word, which made Sofia smile even more.

"Okay porky," Sofia said, tightening her grip on Raven's shoulder, "It's time for you to show me where you found the Fountain of Youth..."

Suddenly, "Or what?" Raven blurted out rudely.

"Now now," Sofia said mockingly, "That's no way for a girl your age to act. Especially not a little porker like you. You're in no position to fight back. Either you help me find the Fountain of Youth, or else I'll make sure that you'll stay like this forever. I'll make you regret finding that fountain in the first place. We will never help you lift this curse. I will make sure that you stay as the little porker that you are, and I will make you're life a living hell. Am I making myself clear?"

Before Sofia could receive an answer, Raven bit her hand, forcing her to release her grip, and broke free. While Sofia was distracted Raven seized the opportunity and tried to run away.

But did Raven manage to escape?

11111221221.content:
Frustrated by the stubbornness of her chunky little rival, Sofia clutched her hand, that still had bite marks sunk into the palm. Still in pain, she slowly followed the fat little six year old while cursing her under her breath.

Just for one moment, it looked as if Raven Skye was about to escape from the clutches of her huge arch nemesis, at least for the time being, but the strain of running for her now was far too overwhelming. She could no longer keep up with the pace that she had as an adult. Her steps became slower and slower as she struggled to keep her breath and avoid passing out.

Before she could move around the corner, before she could temporarily remove herself from Sofia's line of vision, two of her minions emerged and pointed their rifles at the chunky six year old. Realizing that she could not avoid them, she immediately broke to a halt and froze in fear. She took a few steps back, hinting to the men that she intended to run the opposite direction, only to be grabbed on both shoulders by Sofia, who lowered herself onto her knees to stare at her face to face. Her face blocked almost everything in Raven's vision, giving her a realization of what she had just done.

As Raven tried to catch her breath, Sofia glared into her eyes furiously. "Now Missy," Sofia said with a building rage within her, "That's no way for you to behave to your superiors, now is it?"

Once again fearful for her life, Raven gulped and simply shook her head, just like a young child being told off by her parents. This brought back several unwanted memories for the six year old.

"Listen to me," Sofia continued, "Unless you want to spend the rest of your life as the little porker as you are, I suggest that you lead us to where we want to go."

There was still a small glimmer of courage left in Raven for her to talk back to her nemesis. "What's in it for me?" However she was surprised by the answer that she received. "Well," Sofia answered, "I promise you that once you lead us to the Fountain of Youth, even though I really prefer you like this, we'll help as much as we can to lift this curse. So are we on agreeing terms now?"

Raven had to consider the offer. There was no determining whether or not this curse could be lifted. But what was more concerning was whether or not she could trust her arch enemy. They had been enemies for several years and Raven had known Sofia long enough to know whenever she was lying through her teeth or not. Sofia was not to be trusted, but then again, there was no point in arguing with her at this point, considering the huge size, age and experience that she had over me, even though it was unbearable to be mocked and called a porker once again, as if reliving her horrific childhood wasn't bad enough.

Sofia anticipated a reply, but what did Raven do at this point?

After a moment of contemplating, Raven reluctantly accepted the offer, which created a smile upon Sofia's gigantic face once more.

"Good," Sofia smiled, "We'll set off immediately." With that said, Sofia pulled herself back to a vertical stance, with her shadow looming over Raven, and gave her minions an order. "Take little miss porky here to the jet." And with that said, Raven was taken by the men and was put into the back of their van.

Raven said nothing, only staring at the floor in shame. "That's why I've come prepared," Sofia added, "I've packed some of my old clothes from when I was about twelve years old. Maybe they'd be able to fit you, at least just barely. Why don't you go into the little girl's room and put them on? Just be sure not to stretch them for me, okay? Off you pop!" It was horrible enough that Raven had to wear the clothes of her rival from when she was only twelve years old, but her chubby cheeks grew bright red when she realized that she was still too fat to fit into them!

Raven left the bathroom, now wearing a pair of Sofia's old shorts which constricted around her thick legs, and a sleeveless top, ironically with an image of a pig on it, which pressed against her skin. After Raven presented herself to her enemy in her old clothes, Sofia broke out in laughter. " Oh my," Sofia cried in laughter, "I think I should have given you some clothes from when I was a little older!" The sound of Sofia's laughter made Raven feel even worse, this was just what she feared after making the deal with her.

After calming herself down, Sofia sits back down as the jet flew over the ocean. She offered Raven a seat next to her, which she had no choice but to accept. So Raven squeezed onto the chair as Sofia chuckled to herself.

"You know porky," Sofia said to the chubby six year old, who simply stared at her feet, "When we inspected you before boarding this jet, I was surprised. From looking at you, I'd say that you were one of the fattest little girls in the country. But after weighing you on our scales, I've learned that, even with your overweight stature, I'm still twice as heavy as you. And from measuring you, we found that you were even shorter than my own leg? I'd have to drop to my knees just so you can stretch your arm and touch my nose! Doesn't that frighten you? Doesn't it frighten you to know that your bitter rival, the woman that you feuded with for so many years, has total dominance over you?"

Raven simply ignored her as Sofia continued rambling on. "You know what else porky? After years of bickering, I'm actually enjoying being alongside you. Isn't it wonderful being on the same side as each other?" From the tone of Sofia's voice, it was obviously a rhetorical question, as Sofia continued rambling to her prisoner. "Don't take this the wrong way, but back then, I really despised you. But now, you've become like a little sister to me. I've always wanted a little sister, especially one that would make me feel better about myself. Hasn't it always been your dream to have a sister of your own? Of course it has. It's wonderful to have someone to look up to. In fact, you're lucky to even be joining us on this journey, because if I had my way, I'd actually take you under my wing and raise you as my own. But business is business, and I've got a job to do, and I intend to stick to it. Speaking of which, how was your first day back at school? None of the other kids called you a porker, did they? It's such a shame how people can be so cruel, isn't it?"

After what seemed like hours of listening to Sofia ramble about how superior she is to her rival, the jet finally arrived at the drop-off point where Raven first arrived on her last journey. The jet landed softly in the middle of the jungle. Raven was shoved off the plane by Sofia, who immediately demanded the correct direction to the Fountain of Youth.

Reluctantly Raven pointed out the direction of their destination. The fat little six year old girl was then tightly grabbed around the arm by the tight grip of Sofia, and dragged along with her as she and her crew began trekking through the heart of the jungle.

While trekking through the jungle, Raven began to underestimate the physique that she used to possess as an adult the last time she made this journey. The obstacles of which she would have easily cleared in no time now required help from her rival, who would shockingly lift her from her feet, with ease, and carry her across these obstacles. Just trying to keep up with Sofia through the damp jungle proved to be exhausting for the six year old, but rather than comforting her, Sofia simply laughed at the humiliation that her enemy was forced to endure. It seemed as if Raven was not going the same route as she did the last time she ventured here, but indeed it was. Against her will, as well as her physical endurance, Raven slowly led her arch nemesis, and her minions, to the temple ruins where she first found the legendary Fountain of Youth.

But what happened next?
111112212211.title: Big Trip for a Little Girl

She did return to her normal age.
1111122122111.content:
As the chubby six year old Raven Skye waddled alongside the much taller Sofia Valda, it seemed as if the heat from the scorching sun was not effecting Sofia's ability to brag. "Wow porky," Sofia boasted, "You're really starting to stink. You look like you've been sweating beads! I hope that I'm not straining you. I'm trying my best to go as slow as possible for you to keep up, you know. I mean you've never been able to keep up with me before but this time, it's like I'm taking care of a little child. Well, that's really no surprise, because you are a little child. A little porker to be exact."

She looked down upon her rival, who momentarily looked up to the face of her adversary. "You know it," Sofia continued as Raven looked away from her, "You know that I'm right. I know how much you hate it, but that's what I love about it. You're hating every minute of this, aren't you? I can tell because of the look on your face. You're trying to hide it but you can't. I can read you like a book, and you look so pathetic. I am really going to miss having you as a little sister, but then again, you're going to make me a very wealthy woman. I might even sprinkle a drop of the water on me. I could do being a little bit youthful, not that I need it really, but a girl has to maintain her looks. Too bad no one ever told you that, isn't that right porky?"

After what seemed like hours of trekking through the damp jungle and putting up with Sofia's boastful ramblings, the group finally entered the temple ruins of which the legendary Fountain of Youth resided. Raven continued to reluctantly lead the way, with the help of the superior Sofia to bring her underground, until they finally arrived at the very fountain. The group were mesmerized by the tranquility of the site. The clear, crystal water flowed. The crack in the wall lit up what was a beautiful sight to behold. With her little prisoner's end of the bargain fulfilled, Sofia released her grip of Raven's bicep, shoving her to the ground slightly, and ordered her men to bring in the rest of their equipment.

Rubbing the bruise on her arm from where Sofia had her tight vice-like grip on her, Raven slowly stumbled back to her feet, with grazes upon her knees, realizing that she had indeed fulfilled her part of the arrangement. She was once again standing in the presence of the Fountain of Youth, which looked far more larger from her new perspective. Raven extended her arms out, anticipating a change. She thought to herself that if she were to return to the fountain, then the curse would then be lifted.

But was the curse lifted or not?
1111122122111.title: Return to the Fountain

She did something else.
11111221221111.content:
Nothing happened. Raven lowered her arms back down to her thick sides in utter disappointment. She looked around, not knowing what to do now, until she saw Sofia Valda, the one who promised to help her, go about her business. Raven indeed fulfilled her part of the bargain, and yet as Raven stood there, she was irritated by the arrogance demonstrated by her long time arch nemesis, who had seemingly forgot all about her captor. To Raven's annoyance, Sofia simply turned her back on her and took charge of her men, who struggled to bring in the rest of the equipment necessary to profit from this discovery.

In an attempt to regain the attention of her rival, Raven approached her from behind and tugged on her tight jumpsuit. Sofia noticed this and giggled. "How pathetic", she boasted as she turns herself back around and drops onto her knees, clouding Raven's sight with her huge face. "What does my little porker want?" She asked, talking to the six year old as if she was a baby.

Unwilling to be treated like a child any further, Raven slammed her foot to the ground in anger. "I've had enough," she yelled, "Stop talking to me like that! I've had enough!" No matter how hard she tried to assert herself, she could not avoid looking like a pathetic little child throwing a tantrum, to the amusement of her superior. "We've made a deal. You said that if I brought you here, you'd help me get back to normal!"

At that moment, Raven anticipated a reply from her arch rival. But what was Sofia's reaction?

"My dear little porker," Sofia replied, laughing to herself, "Don't you see? There's nothing wrong with you. You've been normal all along." Raven looked on in confusion. "Don't you believe in fate?" Asked Sofia, "This is you normally. The only thing that was wrong with you was when you lost all of that weight in the first place, when you became an explorer, all the times that we tried to kill each other. You weren't meant to be any of that! That's why you've been given a second chance at life, to live as the pathetic little porker that you were meant to be!"

Unwilling to listen to any more of Sofia's constant ramblings, Raven interrupted her. "You lied to me! You swore that you'd help me!"

Laughing at her once again, Sofia tugged Raven's chunky little cheek. "Cheer up porky! Besides, I do prefer you like this. You'll get used to it." Sofia ascended back to her feet, once again showing the size difference between the two. Before returning to her work, Sofia looked back down to her six year old adversary. "By the way," Sofia added, "Thanks for bringing us here. Now go and eat some chocolate or something tubby!" And with that said, Sofia turned her head away and continued making orders to her minions.

Enough was enough. The fat little six year old girl could not take anymore. She could not take anymore pain, abuse and humiliation in the hands of the evil woman that stood dominant over her since this whole predicament began. No more could she allow herself to be pushed around by the big bully. Realizing that there was hardly any hope left for her to return to her normal age, she had to make a stand. She had to take action, and she had to do it now, before her enemy could have her way with her any further. Raven Skye mustered all of her strength, or at least what's left of it after such a tiresome trek, she mustered all of her courage, and decided to finally take action.

Sofia, ignoring her prisoner, continued ordering her men around, arranging and organizing them as their plot unfolded. Hiding out of sight, Raven investigated the environment, scanning the area for a way to get back at her enemies. Unfortunately for her, there was hardly any. She could not find a suitable way for her to exact her revenge upon her arch nemesis, who constantly humiliated her since her capture. No doubt there were many possibilities to fight back, however there were none of which Raven was capable of as the obese six year old girl that she was forced to live as for the rest of her life. And so she hid behind a stone the same size as her, struggling to calculate a plan, until Raven noticed an opportunity that unfolded before her very eyes.

Raven anxiously watched on as Sofia approached the Fountain of Youth. She stood in front of it, merely inches away from touching the water, just glaring into the water, as her men continued their work. It was as if Sofia was caught in a trance, staring into the crystal clear water. It was too good to be true for the six year old. This was her opportunity. She realized that if she did not strike now, she may never get another chance at retribution for a very, very long time.

It was her, only several years younger. To be precise, Sofia was now sixteen years of age!

Unnerved by her every movement, Sofia slowly approached the chubby six year old girl, who stood pathetically within the teenager's shadow whimpering. You're little plan to teach me a lesson didn't go the way you wanted now did it? You wanted me to be a little girl just like you, but that didn't work did it? "But since you want to be a naughty little porker," Sofia continued, clutching at Raven's chunky shoulder, "I'll have to treat you like a naughty little porker, and naughty little porkers that behave badly have to be punished." With that said, a huge lump developed in Raven's throat.

1111122122111111121.content:
After several minutes, Sofia finally emerged from the waters of the Fountain of Youth, but she was clearly not the same. Raven stepped back with her eyes wide open, anticipating the result of her rebellious act.

Sofia crawled out of the water. She was completely soaked, but this was the least of her current worries. Her jumpsuit, of which she used to wear skin-tightly, was too big, too baggy, too heavy and too wet for someone of her stature. She also noticed that she no longer had breasts, instead she had a flat chest. With the jumpsuit dangling from her body, she slowly climbed back to her feet. She was slightly caught off balance upon her first glance of the area since falling into the water. She wiped the damp hair out of her eyes and froze in horror to see that she had indeed shrunk. To her horror, whereas she used to drop to her knees in order to go face to face with her captor, while standing straight, Sofia was just a mere few inches taller than her adversary. Her body frame had also completely changed. She no longer had the breasts, the buttocks, the strength and the fitness that she once possessed. She felt weak and feeble as she slightly stumbled forward. She approached Raven Skye, who was suddenly much more wider than she remembered.

As Sofia looked down at the chubby little six year old, Raven broke out giggling. At that point, Sofia realized that Raven was no longer the only little girl in the group. Sofia looked around in shock to see her minions, all staring down at her in awe. As Raven laughed out loud, snorting occasionally, Sofia looked back down at her in anger.

"You!" The far more skinnier Sofia screamed in anger, "Look what you did to me!"

"I know," Raven giggled obnoxiously, "I guess it isn't so funny when you're not the only six year old here!"

"Raven Skye, I will kill you for this!" The fury in Sofia's eyes were evident. Raven took notice of this and swiftly shifted into a defensive stance. "What?" she asked, "You don't like being on equal terms with me again?"

Sofia's order was far too extreme, as she quickly found out, when they refused to take her order. Instead they returned to work, deciding to leave the two as they were. Frustrated by this turn of events, Sofia turned her attention back to the one responsible for her transformation.

What happened next?
1111122122111111121.title: Two Little Girls

choices: "I'm sorry. There's nothing we can do, you're stuck like this forever!"

11111221221111111212.content:
When it seemed as if Sofia Valda and Raven Skye were about to engage in a scrap, the entire temple above them rumbled from a loud explosion. Debris fell from above as everyone in the area tried to recover. Suddenly a man came rushing into the area screaming. "This place is gonna blow! Everyone get the hell out of here!" With that said, everyone broke into a crazed frenzy.

As the temple began to crumble, Sofia broke into a panic. As all of her former minions rushed toward the exit, they ignored Sofia's plead for help. Raven was already on her way out until she overheard Sofia's cries for attention. The fat girl, struggling to breathe from exhaustion after attempting to escape, turned back around to see the skinny girl, who was sat on the ground in tears. She was a pitiful sight, and Raven could not allow the reign of her greatest nemesis to end this way. And so, in an attempt to save her, Raven headed back, which only made her far more exhausted.

By the time Raven returned to help out the skinny six year old, she already almost collapsed from exhaustion. All of this excitement was far too much for a chubby girl like her to handle. It seemed as if Raven's attempt to save her arch rival would have been futile, until they spotted a familiar figure arrive just in time.

It was Joey Phillips, Raven's old business partner, who came to the rescue of the chubby six year old girl. "Joey!" Raven cried out, grabbing his attention. He approached the two little girls upon hearing Raven's call for help. "Raven," Joey said, "Are you alright?"

"I've been better," Raven replied.

"Who's the girl?" Joey asked, noticing Raven's six year old peer.

"This is Sofia Valda," Raven answered, "She needs our help."

Without hesitation, Joey picked the two girls up in his arms with ease. "Let's get out of here!" With that said, the trio managed to quickly make their way out of the temple ruins, which shortly crumbled to dust. They made it to Joey's private jet and took off. What would hopefully be the last visit that they'd each have to the Fountain of Youth had finally come to an end.

On the jet ride home, Raven and Sofia both recovered, but were still in dismay about still being six years of age. Raven left Sofia to get used to being a six year old as she joined Joey for a drink and a conversation.

"I'm sorry Raven," Joey chuckled, "But you're too young to be drinking Whiskey."

"Shut up Joey," Raven replied, "That's not funny."

Joey continued to have a laugh at Raven's expense. "I must say, Raven. You are one chubby little girl!"

"Yeah, yeah. Cut it out! I guess that I ought to thank you though for saving us. But how did you find us?"

"I knew that you'd be too stubborn to take that curse for-granted. I had to keep an eye on you just to make sure that you were safe. When I found out that you were kidnapped by Solitaire, I knew exactly where you were headed."

"So you know quite a bit about this curse, right?"

"Well, I've had a thorough look into it."

"So tell me, Joey," asked Raven, "Is there a way how to restore both Sofia and I to our respectful ages?"

Joey had to think for an answer at that moment, but what was his answer?
11111221221111111212.title: Recoil to the Rescue

choices: Skip to the Epilogue.
Skip to their first day in school together.
111112212211111112121.content:
Joey Phillips sighed, briefly reconsidering giving a truthful answer to the chubby little girl, who stood in front of him anticipating an answer. He couldn't bare to break the heart of his former partner. He couldn't bare to give a truthful answer and risk making the six year old cry.

As Raven Skye anticipated an answer however, Sofia Valda joined the conversation. "So," Sofia rudely stated, "Have any of you figured a way out of this?"

"Well," Raven addressed to her rival, "If you hadn't rudely interrupted, Joey was about to tell me." Raven turned her attention back to the man staring down at the two girls.

He sighed once again and came clean with a straight answer. "I'm sorry," Joey answered, "There's nothing we can do. There's no way we can reverse the effects of the Fountain of Youth. I'm so sorry, but you two are stuck like this forever."

"What!?" The two girls screamed in disbelief.

"I can't stay like this!" Raven cried, "What am I supposed to do now!? I can't believe this!"

"You can't believe this? This was all your fault!" Sofia similarly cried, "I wouldn't even be in this mess if you hadn't pushed me into the fountain, you stupid fat porker!"

"My fault!?" Raven screamed at her rival, "If you just left me alone we'd both be just fine!"

The bitterness began to erupt between the two little girls. Joey was caught in between the six year old children, and had to put a stop to the constant bickering before things got out of hand.

"Will you both relax?" Joey yelled as he stomped his foot between the girls before they could attack each other. Intimidated by the adult's presence, the two girls closed their mouths and stepped back, allowing Joey to speak. "Don't you girls worry," Joey added, trying to comfort the girls, "Everything will be okay. Just forget about your old lives and starting looking at this as an opportunity to have a fresh new start. I'm sorry that we can't do anything to change you back to normal, but try and think positive, and I'll figure out a way how we can settle everything."

Raven and Sofia continued to bicker like two siblings during the rest of the trip, but deep down they were both worried about what their new lives had in store for them.
111112212211111112121.title: The Dark Truth

1111122122111111121211.content:
Raven Skye and Sofia Valda had to start life all over again, starting from the age of six years. Shortly after returning from their last trip to the Fountain of Youth, the two girls were both enrolled into Ruby City Elementary School, where the two became classmates. Since starting in first grade, Raven found it much harder to make friends than Sofia did. Sofia quickly became one of the most popular girls in the school, while Raven would be constantly teased and bullied by her classmates for the years to come.

Despite being enrolled at the same school however, the girls were both placed into foster families.

Sofia was adopted by the Martin family, where her father, Victor Martin, was a successful car dealer and her mother, Bella Martin, was a successful estate agent. Sofia became the younger sister of the twelve year old Georgina Martin while becoming the older sister of the one year old baby Robert.

While Sofia enjoyed becoming a member of the Martin family, Raven's family was not as glamorous. Ironically Raven became a member of the Phat family. Her father, Michael Phat, worked at the local candy store, while her mother, Barbara Phat, was unemployed. "The question is," Sofia continued, "What are we going to do with you?"

From her position, Raven could see a sinister plot being contemplated in the glaring eyes of the evil woman. Raven felt a chill crawl up her spine, anxiously awaiting the consequences of her behavior, as Sofia developed a sinister smile upon her lips.

But what was Raven's punishment?
111112212212.title: Bad Consequences

1111122122122.content:
Kneeling down to the chubby six year old's level, clouding her vision with her mere presence, Sofia concluded a sinister plot in her mind, which she thought to be the most appropriate form of humiliation and punishment for the current situation.

"I know something that'll put you in line," Sofia suggested, licking her lips with anticipation, "How about a good, hard spanking?"

Raven's eyes suddenly opened in fright. The hair on her neck stood stiff as she slightly stumbled back at the mere thought of such an action. The thought of being punished in this way horrified the six year old, but she was even more horrified by the person who would be delivering the punishment. Raven knew that allowing herself to endure such a punishment would be satisfactory to her rival in every way. She knew Sofia long enough to know that she would enjoy every moment of it. Sofia thrived on humiliating others, especially Raven, and this would be the ultimate humiliation in her eyes, or at least Raven thought.

Fortunately Raven was sparred a brief moment of relief, the first since her transformation, when one of Sofia's minions caught the evil woman's attention. She turned to the man, who pulled out a familiar container from his backpack.

"Solitaire," the man told his leader, "Why don't we sprinkle her with some youth juice?" The man laughed as he noticed the smile of satisfaction upon the face of his leader. "If she isn't willing to be persuaded now," the man continued, "Why not find out at what age she will be?"

Raven looked at the container in fear, remembering what it was filled with. It was one of the containers that she filled herself. She knew that it contained water from the legendary Fountain of Youth.

The question to how they managed to obtain the container remained unknown at this point, but a more serious question in Sofia's mind, as well as Raven's mind, was which punishment that the chunky six year old girl was about to suffer.

But what was Sofia's solution to this question?

As Raven was placing the tablet to the side, she lost her balance and slipped into the fountain. She started to panic, trying to use all of her strength to get out before the fountain started to take its affect on her, but it was too late, as she could feel her strength begin to fade. She felt a strange tingling sensation rushing through her entire body as she struggled to regain her composure and escape the enchanted water of the fountain. The more she struggled however, the more she could feel her entire body change. She could even feel her clothes begin to loosen from its tightness.

She knew that the longer she stayed in the legendary fountain, the more she would feel this tingling sensation that distracted her under the water. Despite struggling to climb out of the fountain however, she remained stubborn with her beliefs, and despite this strange feeling, she knew that the crystal water couldn't possibly make her any younger, could it?

As she splashed the water more and more, she eventually managed to find a way out of the fountain. But by the time she got out, she realized that the legends of the fountain were indeed true. No longer was she her adult self.

Raven found herself completely changed. But what has she become?

"Sofia?" Raven asked surprise looking at the blonde hair rival of hers. She was sure she did not leave a trail for her to follow! Fearing that Sofia was planning something, Raven pulled out her handgun from her hip holster and pointed at Sofia only to find several other men emerging from near the pool behind her already with her larger and more powerful guns pointed at her.

The men also begin to search her, pocketing her phone, her knife, and her compass. I have arranged a small deal this time with the local tribe by giving news of an incoming trespasser on their ground I am allowed to do whatever I want.....within reason of course."
"What!" Raven spoke as Sofia's men forced her to stand . Sofia was the type of person not to care! Why would she-?
"I did all this just to catch you. The days you suppressed me...torn me down....humiliated me....I will pay you back!" Sofia stood eye to eye to Raven. So close raven felt the spittle from her mouth....ew.

"Burrrg!" Raven gurgled in the water, some of it forcing it's way down her throat in an effort to breath. The water did not taste any different then any other water she has drink before. The only thing this fountain of youth was good for was a drowning Raven thought.After what seemed to be the longest ten seconds in her life, the mercs allowed Raven to come up for air. While Raven gasped for air Sofia spoke without hiding the joy in her voice.
"The tribe here has taught me ways to use the Fountain of Youth. If I just dump you in there you would be nothing more then a child that would need a nappy. But in this case....the years you have will slowly drift away. Slowly each year of humiliation coming back just to bite you Raven."
"You really believe in that stupid curse?" Raven sputtered. "It's nothing more then a waste of words!"

Raven prepared herself, not noticing the slight tingle down her back as she head-butted the malformed nose solder that was holding her down. Getting to her feet and having no time to grab the key to her cuffs or take back her stolen equipment Raven ran down an unknown passageway.

112.content:
The legendary tribe of Zeno, a primitive cult that worships a mythical artifact known as the Silver Stone of Zeno, was rumored to have been exterminated by a group of pirates. The pirates stole the stone for themselves, but little did they realize was that they were cursed by the stone. The curse caused them all to shrink until they disappeared. To this day, it is said that the stone is still buried amongst the wreckage of the pirate ship, which has been dubbed as the Shipwreck of Zeno, in the middle of the Mediterranean Sea.

This was an offer that Raven Skye could not refuse. She spent weeks preparing for this expedition, until finally she found herself in the middle of the sea, on a small ship, preparing to dive into the choppy water.

"Are you sure that this is the spot?" Raven asked her guide anxiously, who proudly nodded his head.

Wearing a very tight scuba outfit, Raven dived into the cold water and began swimming to the bottom of the sea, until finally she found what she believed to be the shipwreck that she was alerted about. She knew that within the wreckage hid the legendary Stone of Zeno.

Curiously she approached the wreckage. Her presence scared some of the small fish away. As she investigated the exterior of the shipwreck, she noticed an entrance into the interior. Surprisingly most of the interior was still intact.

However as Raven searched the wreckage, something happened.

But what happened next?

She swum through the wreckage, cracking open each door in her path. Suddenly, her line of vision was disrupted by the presence of a fish that was the same length of her shin. However, unlike the other creatures along her path, this one did not seem to budge and clear a path for her to swim. She was clearly annoyed by this, and tried to get by, but to no prevail, as the fish continued to prevent her from getting past, as if it was guarding something.

Raven was about to take matters into her own hands, but before she could attempt to do so, she noticed something irregular about the fish. As the fish simply glared at the human, she noticed that the fish was slowly growing. As she looked around, confused by what was happening, she noticed that it was not only the fish that was growing. It is then that she came to a realization. It was not the fish that was growing, it was her who was shrinking!

At this point, the fish was now begin enough to swallow her whole leg, and Raven was still shrinking!

Her limbs slipped from her swimsuit as she lost grip of her snorkel. She could also feel her underwear coming loose until every article of clothing grew too large to be withheld. Before she could be swallowed by her own clothing, Raven managed to wriggle free, exposing a fine, smooth naked body with a perfect pair of breasts and and hourglass figure, and she was astonished that she no longer needed the suit to maintain her breath. She found it particularly interesting that she was able to breathe in such a low depth in the middle of the sea, but at this moment, this was the least of her concerns. The large fish, the same of which was merely the size of her shin moments ago, was now the size of whale compared to her. She was unable to regain her composure, as long as that giant fish continued to track her down, but there was hardly anywhere safe for her to escape to. 114.content:
Several days had passed since Raven Skye set off on her latest expedition. Soon she found herself deep in the heart of a jungle on a small, forgotten and forbidden island in the middle of the western Pacific Ocean. There, Raven fought many a wild animal, dodged many an obstacle and tackled many a puzzle, until finally she was amazed by a tremendous spectacle that stole her attention. Convinced about her latest discovery, she quickly reached into her backpack and slipped out a phone.

"Joey," Raven said on the phone, "I think I've found it."

A masculine voice was heard on the other end of the phone line. "You've found it? You've found the legendary Temple of Transformation?"

"Do you really have to call it that?" Raven asked sarcastically.

"Sorry Raven," Joey apologized, "Have you found the Temple of the Totikum Tribe?"

"Yeah," Raven answered, "This looks like it. Want me to find a way in?"

Raven's suggestion made the masculine voice sound hesitant. "Don't rush into this, Raven. We don't know what this temple is capable of. The last thing that we need right now is you turning into some sort of wild animal!"

Raven chuckled at Joey's remark. "Thanks for the support, Joey. I feel so much better about being here."

"Now Raven, you know I'm only kidding," Joey says, trying to encourage the female explorer, "Just be careful, that's all. I've heard a lot about this temple, including the curse that haunts it."

"You know Joey, you really know how to impress a woman," Raven said sarcastically, the tone of her voice was that of a relaxed and unconvinced manner, "And don't worry about me, I'll be fine. It's not like I'm actually going to turn into a monkey or anything!"

"Alright," Joey says reluctantly, "Just be careful."

"Thanks Joey, I won't let you down." With that said, Raven disconnected her phone and placed it back into her bag. She then pressed forwards, entering the ancient temple surprisingly unharmed. To her surprise, the front gate was light and easy to open.

Now inside the temple, with the stone gate closed behind her, Raven's view was completely blinded by the darkness. To overcome the darkness, Raven took out a flashlight from her backpack and lit it up, giving her a brief and short-ranged view of her surroundings. As she slowly crept across the stone floor, her every movement echoed throughout the temple. The dead silence was enough to unnerve even the strongest of minds, but Raven continued to creep forward, moving further and deeper into the dark temple.

She then encountered an obstacle in her path. Presented to her was a choice of three stone doors, each with a symbol engraved upon them. She examined them all carefully. The door to her left held a symbol that resembled some sort of monkey's head while the door in the right held a symbol that resembled a stick figure with something happening to it. Curiously Raven tried to contact her partner, but was unable to receive a signal on her phone from inside the temple.

Acting under her own accord, what did Raven do next?
114.title: The Temple of Transformation

"Quite well indeed. We have finally found what you were looking for." a voice answers back.

"Yes, and it is all mine to shape to my will." Sofia answers. In her hand is the Perciever's Gauntlet, said to be an item crafted by a Trickster God who helped a mortal use the power of the gods to win a war. It transformed into a sword to fit the mortal's needs and was able to fight the enemy forces with confidence and power. From the war, the mortal felt satisfied with their goals, yet worked towards improving the land for some time. Believing that no one should hold this much potential, they hid it away, rather living a different life without it.

Seeing that Sofia has the Perciever's Gauntlet in hand means that she plans to use it for her own nefarious goals. That is something Raven can not abide by. What's worse is that Sofia has changed it to become that of a necklace that she immediately wears around her neck. In a sense, it can't be good.

Creeping up on her rival and her group by hiding behind rocks, Raven makes sure to bet on her chances of getting out. That gauntlet needs to get away from her troublesome hands.

"This artifact looks nice on me. Could be used for my future plans in selling weaponry and goods to the highest bidders." Sofia says. "Forgery and fine craftsmanship can always be quite a thing."

"You can always go to those comic conventions with that thing, and wear whatever you wish." Cletus, one of her henchmen, says. "I think you would make an alluring vampire or one of those movie heroines with your attractive appearance of course."

"Excuse me?" Sofia says with a bit of wonder.

He looks away from her to look elsewhere. "I'm sorry, but when I was busy tending to your room with gifts, I noticed a catalogue of costumes on your vanity and had seen images of various costumes and wardrobes."

"But you assume that I would wear something for an event such as that?" Sofia says to him.

Cletus is unsure how to respond. He squints his eyes, trying to think of something to say to her. "You are...admiral Mistress. I did not wish to speak ill of you." Cletus answers.

As he looks away, Sofia blushes a little at him, and then turns her attention to the necklace. "Why, thank you, Cletus. I'll keep that in mind." Sofia says. "So much power."

Raven decides that it's best to do something and prevent this woman from getting cocky with her new power. The gauntlet needs to be preserved. As the two continue to admire their treasure, Raven makes noise from behind a large rock. She becomes shocked at her own careless nature, realizing how bad the situation can get.

Hearing the sound, Sofia scowls, for she knows all too well what this mean. "Blast you, Rayne! Always stepping into my business with your annoying stupidity!" Sofia turns to face Raven, ready to take on her hated foe. This time, she hopes to settle things there and now. With her artifact, she crafts a fully-functional rocket launcher and aims at the rock, firing at it.

A bit shocked at this display, Raven dodges the blast and rock debris with quick thinking. Pieces of the rock scatter around her as she regains composure and tries to get close to Sofia the best she can. Things may get messy should she become reckless. Quickly, Raven hides behind another rock, only for Sofia to send another rocket at her location. A large blast emerges from the spot she aimed at, spewing rocks around the area. Still, to Sofia's surprise, Raven still lives without much trouble.

Raven knows how dangerous that power can be with Sofia taking charge. Sofia has proven to be quite an enemy that can become unstable when the stakes are too high. Her foe needs to be stopped. Preparing herself, Raven looks at her options before taking action. "That necklace doesn't belong to you!" Raven says as she charges towards Sofia.

"Enough with you!" Sofia says loudly. Her rocket launcher disappears, which Sofia uses the power to then creates dual blades. Using them, Sofia rushes at and swipes at Raven, who dodges the attack successfully. Raven continues to be on the defensive as Sofia swipes at her, wishing to cut her to pieces. Having trained most of her life in becoming the best, Sofia continues to prove to be a competent foe for Raven. Although, despite Sofia's skill in sword-fighting, Raven proves to be too agile against her. She continues to evade her death as always. "Why won't you die, woman!"

"It's not on my to-do list!" Raven shouts. She quickly grabs one of Sofia's arm and struggles to grab the necklace from her neck. "Besides, I'm like the hero and Mary Sue to your evil story, so you know what happens next!" Raven says while grinning through the tension.

"Raven. Raven Skye," Joey Phillips was having a briefing with his partner. "We just received a few offers that you might find interesting."
Anticipating a new objective, Raven asked for the first two offers.

"How about this?" Joey explained, "There's an artifact buried in a cave in northern Alaska. It's called the Ring of Meur. It is said that it was created by the Norse God of Evil, Loki, and that it is very powerful."
"I'm listening," Raven said calmly.
"Get this. That ring is supposed to be capable of bending reality itself." The exaggeration in the tone of Joey's voice did not amuse Raven Skye. "Stay with me, Raven, stay with me. You've heard of Alexandra Johnson, haven't you?"
"Yeah, she's a famous supermodel from Ruby City. Why?"
"Well, there's been several rumors going that she used to be a he. Alexandra used to be a cop until he ran into this old hag who possessed that very ring. Using it, the old hag altered reality itself, turning him into the supermodel that we know today."
Raven laughed. "Yeah, right! And I suppose that Torrie Laursen used to be his heterosexual girlfriend?"
"Well..." Joey shrugged. "And shortly afterward, the old hag died, hiding the ring somewhere in the northern caves of Alaska."

"What else you got?" Raven asked.
"Well," Joey replied, "You know about 'Fem-Zo' don't you?"
"Yeah, Fem-Zo is an organization that focuses on genetic engineering and altering the physicality of human females. Why?"
"It is said that one of their professors, Doctor Mindman, had been working on a secret project called the 'Collapso-Ray'."
"What's that?"
"It's a device that can manipulate the particles of a human being, shrinking the target instantly!"
"No way!"
"Yeah, but the source of the device is from an ancient artifact called the Silver Stone of Size."
"And so you want me to get it back. Is that right?"

"Precisely. So, has any of these peaked your interest?"
